GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews, displays all reviews if omitted, sort_by any valid column, order defaults to descending

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a review object based on the parametric endpoint

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments based on the parametric endpoint of the selected review

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: posts a comment to a review based on the parametric endpoint of the selected review
